assignment

Class OrderFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.Reservation
      • assignment.ReservationFile
        • assignment.OrderFile

  • public class OrderFile
extends ReservationFile
    Inherited base class of ReservationFile, which adds items in an order, removes an item from the order, prints the current order details, prints the order invoice, and adds the details on the text file.
    Author:
    neethumohanan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDessertOrder()
      Adds a dessert item to the current order.
      void addDrinkOrder()
      Adds a drink item to the current order.
      void addMainCourseOrder()
      Adds a main course item to the current order.
      void addSetPackageOrder()
      Adds a set package to the current order.
      float calculateTotal()
      calculateTotal() calculates the total by using the prices of each individual items.
      void checkStaff()
      checkStaff() checks whether the person taking a order is a waiter or not.
      void createOrder(boolean ordered)
      createOrder() displays the items that can be ordered and lets the user select a category to order from.
      void dataToFile()
      dataToFile() writes the details of the order on the text file.
      void printOrder()
      printOrder() lets the user to view the current order details when the order has not been finalised, and accordingly, new items can be added or existing items can be removed.
      void printOrderInvoice()
      printOrderInvoice() prints the order invoice has been finalised.
      void removeOrder()
      removeOrder() removes an item from the current order, if it exists in the order placed.
      int returnCount()
      Returns the number of items placed in order.
      java.util.Date returnDate()
      Returns the time and date when the order was placed at.
      Order returnOrder()
      Returns the order details.
